1.3: Four young women have started coding. They are Minenhle ,Ncamisile, Nonhlanhla and Nokwazi. They dont have computers so they will be coding on their phones. After they have learnt a section they will create lessons for others to follow.
1.postbody: Four young women have started coding. They are Minenhle ,Ncamisile, Nonhlanhla and Nokwazi. They dont have computers so they will be coding on their phones. After they have learnt a section they will create lessons for others to follow.
